arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ
translation: the Day when they will rush out of their graves as if they are racing towards an idol[16],
footnotes: [16] i.e., just as they used to race towards a newly appointed idol, to be among the first of its worshipers.
